name: Vampire Valley (Julye)
description:
Update: Now in english!

When a mysterious eclipse makes the night come early, it is up to you to take a chance on the dark streets of the city to pick up your child from school. The creatures of the night roam the streets when darkness takes over the city and look for victims to satisfy their hunger, regardless of who they are.

Vampire Valley is the one-week college project developed for the subject "Development of Worlds and Mythologies: Art and Writing" at Twine.

Leave me a comment about what you think about this interective story
